message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a rare opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $900000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $750000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $825000. This is my final offer in this range. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
